## Ranking
We create a ranking of ILOs.
Phrasing does not include tense used.

```{r cars}
ilo_ranking <- ilo_data %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  select(Course,Level, ILO,`Course_Intention/Student_profile`, Concise, Clear_capacity, Clear_content, Phrasing, Measurable_behaviour, Level, Concentration) %>%
  mutate(Orientation = case_when(
    `Course_Intention/Student_profile` == 'S' ~ 1,
    T ~ -1),
    Rank = Concise + Clear_capacity + Clear_content + Phrasing  + Orientation
    #+ Measurable_behaviour
    ) %>%
  arrange(desc(Rank))
ilo_ranking
```
